reviews.review: One of the best puzzle games every created!

Очень хорошоя игра сложная и нервная но хорошая. Уитли: злой,наглый,нечесный тип. Я когда первый раз зашол думал подумаеш лёгкая игра но в 7 глове начились мучения. Короче есть мультиплэер и можно свой камиры делать. Покупайте не пожелеете.


перевод с русского на английский.

Horoshoya very difficult game and nervous but good. Wheatley: angry, arrogant, nechesny type. When I first thought zashol podumaesh easy game but 7 Glowe nachilis torment. In short, you can have your multipleer and Camiri do. Buy pozheleete not.

Тем кто играл в первую часть. я советую поиграть и во вторую.

Мне нравятся головоломки. Меня особо не интересует само существование портала, как физического явления. Мне просто нравиться решать задачки. С порталами "о смотри, это моя спина!" я наигрался ещё в первой версии. Вторая часть намного интереснее.

Сюжет правда... лучше просто не парится. Сначала мы помогаем другу который становится злодеем, и тут же помогаем злодейке, которая становится другом.

Но всё решает финальная песня ^_^
SUPER EINFACH GEIL DIE GLADIS ^^

[h1]Yes Valve, this is a Game[/h1]
 It's captivating, funny and never boring. A Must-Have in your game library.

This game was very entertaining, especially with the additions of Gels to add to the chamber solving.
Wheatly kept this game entertaining, the lines were genius.

I'm really looking forward toward any Half-life+Portal lore tie-ins in the future.
Skvělá logická hra ;)
when go co-op, play with ur friends who never beat this game before, or u'll regret it GUARANTEE
Amaze ball co0ol
Sehr gutes Spiel macht Spaß und mann muss ab und zu bisschen Nachdenken :D
One of the best games ever made by Valve. Both fun and challenging.
Отличный сюжет, отличная игра. Стоит играть с другом ради дополнительных испытаний, в них есть небольшое продолжение сюжета, хоть они и достаточно короткие.
The sequel to Portal, this game is nearly 2x better in my view. With 2 player/Co-op Mode, better graphics and new things to try, who could say no to this sequel of an epic puzzle game?

das Spiel is echt der hammer  :)
unbedingt holn, wers noch net hat, das gilt auch fur portal 1 ^^

edit: Ich will nen Portal 3 :D
Amazing Game, Mostly comes down to the ability to create yourown test chambers.
Bom jogo para ativar sua mente ;)
Great game, I feel some of the puzzles were harder than they were in the first one. A fantastic, entertaining game that requires a combination of logic and deduction.

At this point, if you're on the store page looking at this game, you're probably just getting it so you can understand the endless memes flying around. No, the memes are not funnier if you've played this game.
Muy bueno y en español
Świetna gra łamigłówkowa z elementami humoru oraz fabułą. Polecam!
if you like kfc then you like portal 2, same thing basically
Simply incredible
Awesome, logical game with verry funny dialogs. Dont forget to get some friends to play co-op!
Gran juego de plataformas, con zonas secretas que te dejaran sorprendido y el gran afecto que le coges a GLaDOS en su forma de POTaTOS.
포탈 진짜 꿀잼입니당!
Played it so many times, on xbox and pc, and it's just a great game. The story line is amazing and it's got a surprising replay value.
Прекрасное продолжение отличной головоломки.

Unico. Semplicemente fantastico. Mai noioso, ti coinvolge alla perfezione in una trama avvincente e, soprattutto, ti costringe ad usare il cervello più di qualsiasi altro gioco. Da consigliare a chiunque.

P.S. Non sopporto chi ha bollato questo gioco come un F.P.S. reputandolo, di conseguenza, un brutto gioco, per non usare altri termini più volgari. Consiglio a quelle persone di farsi curare al più presto.
This has been one of my favourite games to play! Fantastic levels and great storyline!
Amazingly even better than the first game, which was pretty awesome.  Sadly the ending credits are not as good though.
Une référence !

Es macht einfach wahnsinnig viel Spaß! Wenn man die Story durchgespielt hat wechselt man in den Multiplayer, löst von der Community erstellte Rätsel oder erstellt selber welche. Besonders das Spielen mit einem Freund gelingt einfach und macht einfach nur Spaß!
its great m8

Игра отличная, сюжет шикарный! Но вот игра то сама не для слабомыслящих( Даже для меня эта игра тяжелая, но если хорошо подумать то ок-)
P.S - Мозг дымится с 3-4 главы, мозг горит после главы "Воссоеденение"

This game is known as one of the best games evermade. A couple of college students came up with this idea and they joined Valve and took this idea and made it into a realitiy. I know many of you already have it but if you don't I still highly recommend it to have you pick up a copy of it!
Die Story ist genial. Man kommt gar nicht mehr vom Spiel weg, bis man die Story durch hat.
amazing, period
Одна из лучших игр

One of the strongest arguments I've ever encountered for video games being art. 

Until you try multiplayer... then you'll want to hollow your buddy's skull out and fill it with sawdust because it's more useful for solving these puzzles.

Really though a rare experience and not to be missed.
Think with portals.
einfach geil
Liked for the gameplay, loved for the story

dont need to tell any of the huge fan base how awesome this game is, hard puzzles and a in depth co op and single player with snarky humor ensure this game to have 2 thumbs up


I POOP ALOT WHEN I PLAY THIS GAME
This is a amazing game for any one to play its fun, adventures,creative.Use your mind to figure out puzzles.i highly recomend this game.

I like it, it's longer that the first one, it has an epic ending, the teast are really hard and frigthen, it has a really close aproach to GlaDos. Now i want to fight the mantis-man army and warn my paradox test subject.
This is a must own for a PC Gamer. Highly enjoyable.
This game is amazing love playing it over and over.
Awesome game , must have !
This game is in my top 10 for sure the humor was amazing. every game any makes should strive for the quality value puts into their games.
This is probably one of my favourite games of all time. It's hilarious, and gives a few hours of play time. In all, its a great game.
Great game to play with your friends very hard but very fun as well!
It's a longer version of  "Portal" with a new story and coop. You should buy it now. Don't forget to buy 2 copies so you can play with a friend and end a friendship at the same time.

This is honestly one of my favorite games of all time.  The gameplay is very fun and challenging, the story is very simplistic yet complex with much fan speculations, the humor is very nice, and I'm about to make a run on sentence so I'll just stop right now.
moet je spelen
Simply the best game ever...
Simply the best co-op game I have EVER played!  Definitely worth the price of admission.

[i]No me gustan los juegos tipo puzzles, y ya ves, aquí me tienes moviendo cajitas, dando saltitos y esquivando lasers de robots enloquecidos.[/i] 

Es un estruja-cerebros muy intuitivo, con unos graficos fenomenales. Y te ries bastante, con los puntazos continuos de los robots. Jugar en cooperativo es aún mejor. 

[h1]7/10[/h1]

"Excellent! You're a predator and these tests are your prey. Speaking of which, I was researching sharks for an upcoming test. Do you know who else murders people who are only trying to help them?
Did you guess 'sharks'? Because that's wrong. The correct answer is 'nobody.' Nobody but you is that pointlessly cruel."
gg
하...내가 왜 이 명작을 이제서야 했을가....ㅠㅜ
Good.
Good graphics, Great story, Heart warming characters... it's made by valve. If you love portal, its a great game.
This game is so fucking awesome
Игра супер, сюжет отличный, рекомендую всем=)
amasing GOTY 2014
I thought Portal itself was amazing and Portal 2 just made the whole experience better.

Could a sequel actually be better than the original? I submit that it can. This takes Portal to a whole new level. This is a really great game and as a bonus it's longer with more characters, more rooms, and more chaos. Plus it has a two player mode AND a room creator. Buy it now.
Portal and Portal 2 are by far 2 of the best games i've ever played. I'd spend double the ammount for these games and highly recommend them.
Portal 2 is a fascinating game with many mind-boggling levels. It includes a great storyline and some humor which all in all made the game wonderful. I would give it a 10/10
I love this game! It improves on the same addictive game play properties from Portal (1) and with the steam-workshop support and co-op gives it endless re-play value.
muito bom,excelentes graficos e historia que te atrae
I like Portal 2... 11/10
SEXY VOICE <3

The first portal was short but good. Portal 2 is a little longer and you learn somethings about the company. The thing I have always liked about the portal games is your interaction with AI's and Portal 2 doesn't disapoint.
Graphics is too cool!
Un seguito addirpoco degno di portal, per me è uno dei migliori puzzle games di sempre.
This game is truly a work of art. It is challenging in a way that makes you want to finish. If you haven't tried either portal yet, now is the time.
excellent game and totally addictive!!
possibly on of the best games i have played yet. That Next to Battlefield Bad Company, Batman Arkham City and Portal

Absolutely brilliant game! All the puzzles are challenging but not too challenging and are at a perfect level so that you have to think hard but can ultimately solve them. Nothing requires unduly large amounts of reaction and jumping skills...so long as you find the correct solution!

Played this through on a weekend with the kids helping and suggesting solutions as we went through the puzzles. Most fun I've had playing a game in ages! The only bad thing about the game is that, because it is a puzzle solver, it's replayability value is limited. So buy the game and savour every moment because unfortunately you will eventually get to the end!
Amazing game
Awesome game :)
BEST coop game ive ever played, on top of that there is an awesome single player game that picks up where the 1st on left off, i think... is good, play now!

A very perplexing and challenging game that blends both humor and general video game fun with a more serious tone and deep story. Being a sequel to what could've ended up as a standalone legend, Portal 2 expands on the storyline creating hours of endless fun. Here's to a Portal 3!
Одна из самых ахуенных игр, события сюжета просто ахуительны!
Wer kennts nicht?
Essencial para todos
Приятно провел время за пиратской версией что и побудило купить лицензию. Теперь наслаждаемся ко-опом с девушкой.
Divertido, entretenido y uno de los mejores juegos a los que he podido jugar. Si lo encontráis en oferta, no dudéis en comprarlo .
super b
It's a fun game to test your friendship of your friends and or family

This is a great game. Everything is improved from the first portal including a longer, more insteresting story. They also add a lot of different componets to puzzles making them more fun and challenging. Also loved Wheatley and his character with his funny dialogue.
Like the first, but with a story.
